nodes.text: The Skygarden was a floating botanical garden above Chandrila's Hanna City. Following the Battle of Endor, Admiral Ackbar met with the New Republic pilot Norra Wexley at the Skygarden in an attempt to convince her to end her search for Han Solo. Norra refused and resigned from the New Republic Defense Fleet. She and her team including her son Temmin Wexley then resumed their hunt for Solo.
